page.description: Remove the user group named from the currently connected database or server.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::DropUserGroup() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .DropUserGroup( GroupName as C ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object. GroupNameThe name of the group to drop.
Description The DropUserGroup()removes the user group named from the currently connected database or server. Limitations Example dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C cs = "{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}" if .not. conn.open(cs) then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.DropUserGroup("Techwriting") then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end if conn.close()
See Also SQL::Connection Object
